Frequently Asked Questions

How do I connect my Solana wallet?+
You can connect your Solana wallet by clicking on the "Connect Wallet" button in the top right corner of any page. We support Phantom, Solflare, and other popular Solana wallets. Simply select your preferred wallet provider and follow the instructions to connect.
Is there a minimum deposit amount?+
Yes, the minimum deposit amount is 0.01 SOL. This ensures that transaction fees can be covered and provides a baseline for gameplay.
How long do withdrawals take?+
Withdrawals are processed on the Solana blockchain and typically complete within 1-2 minutes. During times of high network congestion, this may take slightly longer.
What fees are associated with playing games?+
We charge a small fee of 1.5% on all game winnings to maintain the platform. Standard Solana network transaction fees also apply for deposits and withdrawals.
How do I report a bug or issue?+
If you encounter any issues, please fill out the contact form on this page with detailed information about the problem you're experiencing. Our team will investigate and respond as soon as possible.
